title: Honour those who fell to Omega Squad Teemo

replies.body: These bundles are becoming impractically large
Completely agree, nearly $100 for a bundle what is this rito? {{item:3070}}
Over 20k RP including champions, nearer $200
{{champion:16}} is so good in urf

nope she loses health to often. she used to be good but since riot nerfed her to not use mana to heal and she uses her own health to heal.
so now soraka isnt broken in URF. XD just saying
Except the spell vamp doesn't stack

Her Q got changed though, and it's eminently dodgeable leaving her with little direct attack. The Spirit Visage works and you can rely on just casting ult a lot, but she has a severe lack of offensive power.

They effectively killed assault Soraka IMO. Used to be able to Abyssal/Sorc/Q/Q/Q/Q, and WotA worked with that. Now... Less so. I'd rather Sona than Soraka in URF, Sona hits harder, heals faster, and her ult is invaluable against a Wukong or a Yi.

Or both, her ult doesn't discriminate.

My toxic mundo will no longer be special {{item:3070}}
ME TOOO D;
I can't find any in game images for the updated Red Riding Annie, can anyone help?

Omg, I wish rito would stop putting legacy skins back on sale. The whole point of buying these skins is buying them so they look cool in a few months/years when no-one has them. This kind of defeats that purpose if you keep trying to make Cash putting them back on sale (Especially with the excuse of a freaking teemo skin murdering them).

sigh, rant over

I managed to exactly use the last of my RP on Red Riding Annie.

TL.DR I'm back to 0 RP

P.S. If you couldn't be bothered reading the first line but read the TL.DR, then... oh who am I kidding you wouldn't have read this if you couldn't be bothered to read the first line xD
